text:
Yuriy Dyachuk-Stavytskyi (; 26 January 1947 – 24 June 2020) was a Ukrainian football manager. He coached following teams FC Bukovyna Chernivtsi, FC Prykarpattya Ivano-Frankivsk, FC Volyn Lutsk, FC Hazovyk Komarne (today's FC Lviv), FC Anzhi Makhachkala, and FC Metalurh Zaporizhia. He was born in Lviv.
Dyachuk-Stavytskyi died on 24 June 2020 in Lviv, aged 73.
